courses.title: Security Fundamentals for Engineers
courses.description: Learn Airbnb's security principles, data handling requirements, and common vulnerabilities to avoid. Required before accessing production systems.

courses.title: Airbnb Code Standards & Best Practices
courses.description: Overview of Airbnb's coding standards, style guides, and development workflow. Covers Git practices, code review expectations, and testing requirements.

courses.title: Trust & Safety Engineering Practices
courses.description: Deep dive into Trust & Safety systems: content moderation workflows, ML models, sensitive data handling, and compliance requirements.

courses.title: Advanced Python for ML Engineers
courses.description: Master advanced Python patterns for building production ML systems. Covers async programming, performance optimization, and MLOps practices.

courses.title: Designing Distributed Systems
courses.description: Learn patterns and practices for building scalable distributed systems. Covers consistency, availability, partition tolerance, and common architectures.

courses.title: Product Management Fundamentals
courses.description: Introduction to Airbnb's product development process, including strategy frameworks, prioritization methods, and stakeholder management.

courses.title: Airbnb Values & Culture
courses.description: Deep dive into Airbnb's core values, mission, and company culture. Learn how our values inform product decisions and team collaboration.

courses.title: User Research Methods at Airbnb
courses.description: Learn Airbnb's approach to user research, including when to use different methods, how to recruit participants, and synthesizing insights.

courses.title: Data-Driven Product Decisions
courses.description: Learn how to use data to inform product strategy, design experiments, and measure success. Covers A/B testing, metrics frameworks, and analytics tools.

courses.title: Effective Stakeholder Management
courses.description: Strategies for managing diverse stakeholders, building alignment, and driving consensus on complex product decisions.

courses.title: Workday Administration Basics
courses.description: Comprehensive training on Workday HRIS system. Covers employee data management, benefits administration, PTO tracking, and reporting.

courses.title: GDPR & Data Privacy Compliance
courses.description: Learn GDPR requirements and how they apply to employee data handling. Covers data subject rights, consent, and breach notification.

courses.title: Employee Relations Fundamentals
courses.description: Introduction to employee relations including conflict resolution, performance management support, and handling sensitive situations.

courses.title: Benefits Administration Deep Dive
courses.description: Detailed overview of Airbnb's benefits programs, enrollment processes, and how to support employees with benefits questions.

required.reason: Required before accessing production systems and sensitive data
Essential for maintaining code quality and passing code reviews
Critical for working with Trust & Safety systems and content moderation
Understanding our values helps you make better technical decisions

recommended.reason: Popular with your team - 80% of Trust & Safety engineers have completed this
Helpful for understanding Airbnb's microservices architecture

Our values are central to how we make product decisions
Essential for conducting user research and gathering insights

recommended.reason: Highly rated by PMs - helps with experimentation and metrics

required.reason: Core system for all HR operations - must complete before system access granted

Understanding our values helps you support employees better
Essential for supporting managers and employees with workplace issues
